entry.title: Honey with Pistachio
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1350.00 - 1620.00 (2 variants)

Honey with Pistachio is a delicious and nutritious spread made with honey and ground pistachios. It has a sweet and nutty flavor and a smooth, creamy texture. Honey with pistachio can be enjoyed on its own, or it can be used to top toast, pancakes, waffles, and other baked goods. It can also be used in smoothies, yogurt parfaits, and ice cream sundaes.

Quick Facts:

  • Honey with pistachio offers a rich source of protein, fiber, and healthy fats.
  • Pistachios provide essential nutrients like vitamin E, magnesium, and copper.
  • Honey is abundant in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds, contributing to its health benefits.

How to Use:

Honey with pistachio can be enjoyed in a variety of ways. Here are a few ideas:

  • Spread it on toast, pancakes, or waffles for a delicious and nutritious breakfast.
  • Top your yogurt parfait with honey with pistachio for a sweet and nutty treat.
  • Add it to your smoothie for a boost of protein and healthy fats.
  • Drizzle it over ice cream for a decadent dessert.
  • Use it in baking to add flavor and moisture to your baked goods.

Here are a few specific recipes that you can try:

  • Honey Pistachio Smoothie: Combine 1 cup milk, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup ground pistachios, and 1 banana in a blender. Blend until smooth and enjoy.
  • Honey Pistachio Yogurt Parfait: Layer yogurt, honey with pistachio, and granola in a glass or jar. Repeat layers until the glass or jar is full. Top with fresh fruit and enjoy.
  • Honey Pistachio Ice Cream Sundae: Scoop your favorite ice cream into a bowl. Drizzle with honey with pistachios and top with chopped pistachios. Enjoy!

Beri (Sidr) Honey:  


Description: Dive into the divine nectar of Beri Honey, collected by bees from the blossoms of Sidr trees in the mountainous regions of Pakistan. This exquisite honey, with its 100% organic origins, delights with its reddish-brown hue, velvety texture, and sweet, fruity notes.1

Quick Facts: Beri Honey is your ally in allergy defense, soothing elixirs, digestion, weight management, skin health, blood sugar balance, antioxidant abundance, heart wellness, and nature's sweet sweetness.

Description: Mixing nuts in Beri Honey brings a delicious and nutritious fusion of textures and health benefits. Nuts contribute protein, fiber, healthy fats, and essential vitamins and minerals, while Beri Honey adds sweetness and antioxidants.

Quick Facts: Nuts like almonds, walnuts, cashews, peanuts, and pecans meet Beri Honey's antioxidants and anti-inflammatory properties to boost heart health, energy levels, immune defenses, and cellular protection.

How to Use: Create a trail mix, top your yogurt, enhance smoothies, or use it as a spread for a delightful, energy-boosting treat.

Salajeet (Shilajit):


Description: Salajeet, also known as Shilajit, is a natural substance formed over centuries by the gradual decomposition of organic matter in the Himalayan rocks. It's a sticky, dark brown or black substance with various potential health benefits.

Quick Facts: Salajeet offers improved energy levels, reduced inflammation, enhanced cognitive function, boosted immune system, improved heart health, increased testosterone levels (for men), improved fertility (for men), and boosted sexual performance (for men and women).

How to Use: Mix Shilajit powder with warm milk or water, take Shilajit capsules with food, add Shilajit liquid to smoothies or juices, or apply it topically to reduce inflammation and promote wound healing.


Saffron:


Description: Saffron is a precious spice derived from the saffron crocus flower and is known for its vibrant red color, intense aroma, and slightly bitter taste. It's a valuable addition to culinary and beverage delights.

Quick Facts: Saffron offers improved mood, enhanced cognitive function, reduced inflammation, improved heart health, and antioxidant protection.

How to Use: Infuse your dishes with its unique flavor, elevate your beverages, or consider saffron threads as a dietary supplement.

entry.title: Slimming Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:

Slimming tea is a type of herbal tea that is claimed to help promote weight loss. It is typically made from a blend of herbs, such as green tea, ginger, and oolong tea, that have been shown to boost metabolism, improve digestion, and reduce inflammation.

Quick Facts:

  • Some herbs, such as green tea and ginger, can help boost metabolism, which can lead to increased calorie burning.
  • Some herbs, such as peppermint and fennel, can help to improve digestion, which can help to reduce bloating and constipation.
  • Some herbs, such as turmeric and chamomile, have anti-inflammatory properties, which can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body.

How to Use

  • Twice a Day: Consume it twice daily, in the morning and before bedtime.
  • Simple Preparation: Steep a tea bag or loose-leaf tea in hot water for 3-5 minutes.
  • Customize Flavor: Add honey or lemon to tailor the taste to your liking.

It is important to note that slimming tea is not a magic bullet for weight loss. It is important to combine slimming tea with a healthy diet and exercise routine to achieve sustainable results.

entry.title: Salajeet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1800.00 - 3600.00 (2 variants)

Shilajit, also known as salajeet, is a natural substance that is formed over centuries by the gradual decomposition of plants and other organic matter in the rocks of the Himalayas. It is a sticky, tar-like substance that is dark brown or black. Shilajit has been used in traditional medicine for centuries for a variety of ailments.

Quick Facts:

Some of the potential health benefits of shilajit include:

  • Improved energy levels: Shilajit has been shown to improve energy levels in people with chronic fatigue syndrome.
  • Reduced inflammation: Shilajit has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body.
  • Improved cognitive function: Shilajit has been shown to improve cognitive function in people with Alzheimer's disease and other forms of dementia.
  • Boosted immune system: Shilajit is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system.
  • Improved heart health: Shilajit has been shown to improve heart health by lowering cholesterol levels and reducing blood pressure.
  • Increased testosterone levels: Shilajit has been shown to increase testosterone levels in men.

For Men:

  • Increased testosterone levels: Shilajit has been shown to increase testosterone levels in men. This can lead to several benefits, including increased muscle mass, improved bone density, and enhanced sexual performance.
  • Improved fertility: Shilajit has also been shown to improve fertility in men. It can help to increase sperm count and motility, and it can also improve the quality of sperm DNA.
  • Boosted sexual performance: Shilajit can also help to boost sexual performance in men. It can help to increase libido, improve erectile function, and delay ejaculation.

For Women:

  • Regulated hormones: Shilajit can help to regulate hormones in women. This can be beneficial for women of all ages, but it is especially beneficial for women who are going through menopause.
  • Improved mood: Shilajit can also help to improve mood in women. It can help to reduce stress, anxiety, and depression.
  • Reduced symptoms of menopause: Shilajit can help to reduce the symptoms of menopause, such as hot flashes, night sweats, and mood swings.

It is important to note that shilajit can interact with certain medications, such as blood thinners and diabetes medications. It is important to talk to your doctor before taking shilajit if you are taking any medications.

How to Use

Here are a few tips for using Shilajit:

  • Mix shilajit powder with warm milk or water and drink it on an empty stomach.
  • Take shilajit capsules with food.
  • Add shilajit liquid to your favorite smoothie or juice.
  • Apply shilajit topically to the skin to reduce inflammation and promote wound healing.

Additional tips:

  • Shilajit can be taken in a variety of forms, including capsules, powder, and liquid. The recommended dosage of shilajit varies depending on the form that you are taking. It is important to start with a low dose and gradually increase the dosage as tolerated.
  • If you are pregnant or breastfeeding, it is important to talk to your doctor before taking shilajit.
  • Shilajit is a natural substance, but it is important to buy it from a reputable source.

entry.title: Saffron
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 900.00 - 1530.00 (2 variants)

Saffron is a spice derived from the flower of the saffron crocus, a plant native to Southwest Asia. The spice is known for its vibrant red color, intense aroma, and slightly bitter taste. Saffron is one of the most expensive spices in the world, due to the labor-intensive process of harvesting and processing the stigmas of the saffron crocus flower.

Quick Facts:

  • Improved mood and reduced symptoms of depression: Saffron is effective in treating mild to moderate depression. It is thought that saffron may work by increasing levels of serotonin and dopamine in the brain.
  • Enhanced cognitive function: Saffron has been shown to improve memory, learning, and attention. It is thought that saffron may work by protecting brain cells from damage.
  • Reduced inflammation: Saffron has anti-inflammatory properties that may help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Improved heart health: Saffron has been shown to lower cholesterol levels and blood pressure. It may also help to protect against heart attack and stroke.
  • Antioxidant protection: Saffron is a rich source of antioxidants, which can help to protect cells from damage caused by free radicals. Free radicals are unstable molecules that can contribute to aging and the development of chronic diseases.

How to Use

  • Culinary Delight: Saffron is a staple in Middle Eastern and Indian dishes, adding its distinct flavor and color.
  • Beverage Elevation: Enhance your tea, coffee, or milk by infusing it with saffron's aromatic essence.
Supplement Option: Saffron threads can be consumed as a dietary supplement to potentially harness their health benefits.

Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:

Pure and natural desi ghee is a clarified butter that is made from the milk of cows that have been fed on grass. It is a golden-colored, semi-solid substance with a rich, nutty flavor. Desi ghee is a staple in Indian cuisine and is used in a variety of dishes, both sweet and savory. 

Quick Facts:

Desi ghee has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved digestion: Desi ghee is a good source of butyrate, a short-chain fatty acid that has been shown to promote gut health. Butyrate can help to improve digestion and absorption of nutrients.
  • Boosted immune system: Desi ghee is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Reduced inflammation: Desi ghee has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Improved heart health: Desi ghee has been shown to lower cholesterol levels and blood pressure. It may also help to protect against heart attack and stroke.
  • Enhanced cognitive function: Desi ghee has been shown to improve memory, learning, and attention. It is thought that desi ghee may work by protecting brain cells from damage.

How to Use

Desi ghee can be used in a variety of ways. It is a common ingredient in Indian cuisine and is used in a variety of dishes, both sweet and savory. Desi ghee can also be used as a spread for toast or bread, or as a cooking oil.

Here are a few specific ways to use desi ghee:

  • Add it to dal (lentils) or rice for a rich, nutty flavor.
  • Use it to make ghee roast chicken or fish.
  • Add it to your morning smoothie for a boost of energy.
  • Use it as a hair mask to nourish your scalp and hair.
  • Apply it to your skin as a moisturizer

Gastric relief powder is the herbal blend that is designed to help relieve the symptoms of indigestion, heartburn, and other gastric problems. It is typically made from a combination of herbs that have been used in traditional medicine for centuries to soothe the digestive system. 

Some of the most common herbs used in gastric relief powder include:

  • Ginger: Ginger is a natural anti-inflammatory that can help to reduce inflammation in the digestive tract. It can also help to stimulate digestion and relieve nausea.
  • Fennel: Fennel is a carminative herb that can help to expel gas and relieve bloating. It can also help to stimulate digestion.
  • Cumin: Cumin is a digestive aid that can help to stimulate the production of digestive enzymes. It can also help to relieve gas and bloating.
  • Ajwain: Ajwain is a carminative herb that can help to expel gas and relieve bloating. It can also help to stimulate digestion.
  • Mint: Mint is a cooling herb that can help to soothe the digestive tract. It can also help to relieve nausea and vomiting.

Quick Facts:

Gastric relief powder can help to relieve a variety of gastric problems, including:

  • Indigestion
  • Heartburn
  • Gas
  • Bloating
  • Nausea
  • Vomiting
  • Stomach cramps

How to Use

  • Oral or Diluted: Administer gastric relief powder orally or after mixing it with water.

Versatile Relief: Use as needed to alleviate symptoms or regularly for preventive gastric care.

entry.title: Taramira Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 783.00

Taramira oil, also known as arugula oil or Jamba oil, is a natural oil that is extracted from the seeds of the taramira plant (Eruca sativa). It is a yellow to golden-colored oil with a slightly pungent odor. Taramira oil has been used for centuries in traditional medicine for a variety of ailments. 

Quick Facts:

Taramira oil has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved hair health: Taramira oil is a good source of essential fatty acids, which are important for hair growth. Taramira oil can also help to nourish the scalp and reduce dandruff.
  • Reduced inflammation: Taramira oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Improved skin health: Taramira oil is a good source of vitamins and antioxidants, which can help to protect the skin from damage. Taramira oil can also help to moisturize the skin and reduce wrinkles.
  • Boosted immune system: Taramira oil is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Reduced pain: Taramira oil has analgesic properties that can help to reduce pain. Taramira oil can be applied topically to the affected area to help relieve pain.

How to Use

Taramira oil can be used in a variety of ways. It can be applied topically to the skin or hair, or it can be taken orally.

  • For hair health: Massage taramira oil into your scalp and hair. Leave it on for 30 minutes to an hour before washing it off.
  • For skin health: Apply taramira oil to the affected area. Massage it in gently.
  • For pain relief: Apply taramira oil to the affected area. Massage it in gently.
  • For oral consumption: Take 1-2 teaspoons of taramira oil per day.

entry.title: Coconut Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 945.00

Coconut oil is a white, semi-solid fat that is extracted from the meat of mature coconuts. It has a sweet, nutty flavor and a high melting point. Coconut oil is a popular choice for cooking, as it is stable at high temperatures and does not break down easily. It is also a popular choice for skin care and hair care products.

Quick Facts:

Coconut oil has some potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved heart health: Coconut oil is a good source of medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs), which are a type of fat that is metabolized differently than other types of fat. MCTs can help to raise HDL (good) cholesterol levels and lower LDL (bad) cholesterol levels.
  • Reduced inflammation: Coconut oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to some chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Boosted immune system: Coconut oil is a good source of lauric acid, which is a type of fatty acid that has antimicrobial properties. Lauric acid can help to fight off bacteria, viruses, and fungi.
  • Improved brain health: MCTs can help to improve brain function and memory. MCTs are easily absorbed by the brain and can be used for energy.
  • Weight loss: Some studies have shown that coconut oil can help to promote weight loss. MCTs can help to increase metabolism and reduce appetite.

How to Use

Coconut oil can be used in a variety of ways, including:

  • As a cooking oil: Coconut oil can be used to stir-fry, saute, or roast vegetables. It can also be used to make salad dressings or marinades.
  • As a moisturizer: Coconut oil can be used to moisturize the skin and hair. It is a good choice for people with dry skin or hair.
  • As a makeup remover: Coconut oil can be used to remove makeup. It is a gentle and effective way to remove even waterproof mascara.
  • As a hair treatment: Coconut oil can be used to condition the hair. It can help to make hair soft, shiny, and manageable.

As a massage oil: Coconut oil can be used as a massage oil to help relax muscles and reduce tension

entry.title: Black Seed Oil (Kalwanji)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1539.00

Black seed oil, also known as kalonji oil, is a natural oil that is extracted from the seeds of the black cumin plant (Nigella sativa). It has a strong, pungent aroma and a slightly bitter taste. Black seed oil has been used for centuries in traditional medicine for a variety of ailments. 

Quick Facts:

Black seed oil has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Black seed oil is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Black seed oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Black seed oil can help to improve blood sugar control in people with diabetes. Black seed oil can help to slow the absorption of sugar into the bloodstream.
  • Black seed oil can help to boost testosterone levels in men. Testosterone is a hormone that is important for muscle mass, bone density, and libido.
  • Black seed oil can help to reduce cholesterol levels. Black seed oil can help to lower LDL (bad) cholesterol and raise HDL (good) cholesterol.

How to Use

Black seed oil can be used in a variety of ways, including:

  • Black seed oil can be taken orally by adding it to food or drinks. The recommended dosage is 1-2 teaspoons per day.
  • Black seed oil can be applied topically to the skin. It can be used to treat acne, eczema, and other skin conditions.
  • Black seed oil can be inhaled using a diffuser. This can help to clear congestion and relieve respiratory problems.

entry.title: Sidr (Beri) Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 450.00 - 3015.00 (4 variants)

Beri Honey is a divine nectar gathered by bees from the blossoms of the Sidr tree in the mountainous regions of Pakistan. This honey is celebrated for its exquisite taste and unique origin. The Sidr tree, found in the wild, blesses us with honey that's 100% organic, showcasing a reddish-brown hue and a lush, velvety texture. Its flavor is a sweet revelation, carrying fruity notes that dance on the palate.

Quick Facts 

  • Allergy Defense
  • Soothing Elixir
  • Digestive Companion
  • Weight Management
  • Healing Touch
  • Skin's Delight
  • Blood Sugar Harmony
  • Antioxidant Bounty
  • Heart Health
  • Nature's Sweetness

How to Use Sidr Honey

Beri (Sidr) Honey is a versatile companion in your daily life:

  • Add 1-2 teaspoons of honey to your juices, smoothies, teas, and coffees as a natural sweetener.
  • Enhance your culinary creations by substituting honey for sugar in recipes.
  • For skincare, create a mask by mixing 3 teaspoons of honey with half a teaspoon of cinnamon to combat acne. Apply to your face, leave for 15 minutes, and rinse with lukewarm water.
  • To fade dark spots, blend 2 teaspoons of honey with half a teaspoon of lemon juice, and apply the mixture as a mask for 20-30 minutes.

entry.title: Robinia Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 522.00 - 2340.00 (4 variants)

Robinia Honey, derived from the blossoms of the Black Locust tree in the Chitral and Gilgit-Baltistan regions of Pakistan, is a treasure waiting to grace your palate. This exquisite honey embodies a delicate, lively, and elegant taste, much like a gentle breeze on a sunlit day. It boasts a light to clear color and enchants with its soft, floral notes, leaving your taste buds with a lingering sweetness and hints of vanilla.

Taste and Color:

A dance of flavors awaits your palate as you savor Robinia Honey. It unveils a very thin, delicate, and elegant profile, akin to a gentle breath of wind. With its light-colored, almost clear appearance, this honey delivers a soft and exquisite floral taste that leaves your senses enchanted. A mere taste unveils a tender sweetness, while a subtle, lingering flavor of sweet florals with hints of vanilla graces your mouth.

Quick Facts 

  • Antiseptic Marvel
  • Antioxidant-Rich
  • Allergy-Friendly
  • Slow Crystallization
  • Healthy Sweetening
  • Stress Relief
  • Healing Touch

How to Use:

  • As a Natural Sweetener: Add 1-2 teaspoons of Robinia honey to your beverages like teas, coffees, and smoothies.
  • In Culinary Delights: Replace sugar with Robinia honey in your cooking and baking endeavors, following your recipes.
  • For Skin Nourishment: Create a face mask by mixing 2 teaspoons of honey with half a teaspoon of lemon juice. Apply it to your skin for 20-30 minutes to reduce dark spots and enhance skin quality.
  • Stomach Soother: A spoonful of Robinia honey on an empty stomach, 20-30 minutes before a meal, can help calm stomach inflammation and assist with digestive conditions.

Throat Comfort: In cases of sore throats, Robinia honey can be a soothing and bacterial-fighting remedy, helping to alleviate irritation and reduce cough.

entry.title: Mix nuts in Beri Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 900.00 - 1350.00 (2 variants)

Mixing nuts in beri honey is a delicious and nutritious way to enjoy both ingredients. The nuts add a crunchy texture and protein boost, while the beri honey adds sweetness and antioxidants.

Quick Facts:

  • Nuts: Protein, fiber, healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals.
  • Common nuts: Almonds, walnuts, cashews, peanuts, pecans.
  • Beri honey: Rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds.
  • Nuts in Beri honey: Boost heart health, energy, immune system, and cellular protection.

How to Use:

You can mix nuts in beri honey in a variety of ways. Here are a few ideas:

  • Trail mix: Combine your favorite nuts, such as almonds, walnuts, and pecans, with beri honey. Add dried fruit and seeds for extra flavor and nutrients.
  • Yogurt topping: Top your yogurt with a handful of nuts and a drizzle of beri honey. This is a quick and easy breakfast or snack.
  • Smoothie addition: Add a handful of nuts to your smoothie for a boost of protein and healthy fats. Beri honey can also be added to smoothies for sweetness and antioxidants.
  • Sandwich spread: Spread nut butter on a slice of bread and top with beri honey and sliced bananas. This is a delicious and satisfying snack or meal.

No matter how you choose to use it, mixing nuts in beri honey is a delicious and nutritious way to improve your health.

Here are a few additional tips for using nuts in beri honey:

  • Store your mixed nuts in beri honey in an airtight container in the refrigerator. This will help to keep them fresh and prevent them from becoming rancid.
  • You can also add other ingredients to your mixed nuts and beri honey, such as dried fruit, seeds, or spices. Get creative and experiment with different flavors and combinations to find what you like best.
  • Enjoy your mixed nuts in beri honey as a snack, breakfast, or meal. It's a great way to get a boost of energy, protein, and healthy fats.

entry.title: Acacia Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 585.00 - 1350.00 (4 variants)

Acacia honey is a type of honey that is made from the nectar of the acacia tree. It is a light-colored honey with a mild, sweet flavor. Acacia honey is known for its high fructose content, which makes it slow to crystallize. It is also less likely to cause allergies than other types of honey.

Quick Facts:

Some of the potential health benefits of acacia honey include:

  • Improved wound healing: Acacia honey has been shown to promote wound healing. It can help to reduce inflammation, fight infection, and speed up the growth of new tissue.
  • Cough relief: Acacia honey is effective in relieving coughs. It can soothe the throat and suppress the urge to cough.
  • Reduced risk of heart disease: Acacia honey can help to lower cholesterol levels and improve blood sugar control. These factors can reduce the risk of heart disease.
  • Boosted immune system: Acacia honey is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system.

How to Use

Acacia honey can be used in a variety of ways. Here are a few ideas:

  • Add it to tea or coffee: Add a teaspoon of acacia honey to your morning cup of tea or coffee for a sweet and healthy boost.
  • Use it as a marinade: Acacia honey can be used as a marinade for chicken, fish, or vegetables. It adds a unique flavor and helps to tenderize the meat.
  • Add it to yogurt: Top your yogurt with a drizzle of acacia honey for a delicious and nutritious snack.
  • Use it as a topping for pancakes or waffles: Acacia honey is a delicious and healthy topping for pancakes or waffles.
  • Add it to baked goods: Acacia honey can be used to add flavor and moisture to baked goods, such as muffins, cookies, and cakes.
  • Eat it on its own: Acacia honey can be eaten on its own as a snack or dessert. It is also a good way to sweeten drinks and food without adding refined sugar.

Acacia honey is a delicious and versatile ingredient that can be used in a variety of ways. It is also a good source of nutrients and has several potential health benefits.
